name: bless-anime-game
description: 3D anime-style action game with AI-powered mechanics

scripts.build:debug: tsc --build tsconfig.debug.json && esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=build/public/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --define:DEBUG=true --sourcemap --alias:@=src && mkdirp build && cp -r public/* build/public && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f debug.wasm
scripts.build:release: tsc --build tsconfig.release.json && esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=build/public/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --minify --tree-shaking=true && mkdirp build && cp -r public/* build/public && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f release.wasm
